content: {"locationId": "8836", "organizationId": "7276", "name": "Friendship Feast - First Christian Church - Food Distribution Center", "address1": "210 N 5th St", "address2": "", "city": "Ponca City", "state": "OK", "zipCode": "74601", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "36.7051075", "longitude": "-97.0788832", "foodPrograms": "Hot/Cold Meal Program", "serviceAreas": "ZIP CODE:  74601", "languages": "English", "features": "", "aboutUs": "Friendship Feast is a free meal feeding program, located in the Fellowship Hall of First Christian Church, Ponca City, OK.  Our mission is to feed our guests hot, nutritious meals with no qualifications required to attend. We serve Monday-Thursday weekly from 4:45 - 5:30 p.m., except for major holidays.  Meals are prepared and served by volunteer groups from local church, civic, or social groups, who typically serve once per month.  ", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "580-763-2633", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 64, "regionName": "Regional Food Bank of Oklahoma", "logoBlobNameSmall": "b268ff1b-39fa-45f4-a37e-421975c3f339.png", "website": "https://www.regionalfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["None-None (Call for Information)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
